plays.text: Penalty to Dave Scatchard 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Josh Green
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Arron Asham
Goal scored by Steve Konowalchuk assisted by Jaromir Jagr and Joel Kwiatkowski
Penalty to Sven Butenschon 2 minutes for Interference Jaromir Jagr
Penalty to Jason Blake 2 minutes for Roughing Michael Nylander
Goal scored by Peter Bondra assisted by Jeff Halpern and Steve Konowalchuk
Penalty to Alexei Yashin 2 minutes for Tripping Sergei Gonchar
Penalty to Ken Klee 2 minutes for Tripping Dave Scatchard
Penalty to Jaromir Jagr 2 minutes for Holding Roman Hamrlik
Goal scored by Jeff Halpern assisted by Peter Bondra and Ken Klee
